name: Calculate Hours for Site Acceptance Test
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(FDA Site Acceptance Test:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){<* Eval((16*<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>)+(([IF](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Rudundant EBI Servers.Yes)*>){16}{8}[ENDIF])*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of EBI Servers)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of EBI Workstations)*>))) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(FDA GES Location.None)*>)){<* Eval(<* Eval((16*<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>)+(([IF](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Rudundant EBI Servers.Yes)*>){16}{8}[ENDIF])*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of EBI Servers)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of EBI Workstations)*>))) *>*0.75) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,[NEQ](<*VALUE(FDA GES Location)*>,None))){<* Eval(<* Eval((16*<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>)+(([IF](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Rudundant EBI Servers.Yes)*>){16}{8}[ENDIF])*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of EBI Servers)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of EBI Workstations)*>))) *>*1.15*0.75) *>}{0}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
